data.name: Eyes Over Us Demo
data.detailed_description:
Eyes Over Us is a surreal procedurally generated narrative strategy game were you will play as a Lovecraftian entity watching over two humans being experimented with.



As a lovecraftian entity you act trough pain, suffering and madness, influencing the victims instead of directly controlling them. Transform the mind and the body will soon follow.



This is an experimental game and as such you will find many mysteries in the way things work. Experiment and many revelations will soon follow.



See the world through the lens of minimalistic, beautiful and eerie rotoscoped animations made with real human beings, with their consent, and not in a torture chamber.

data.short_description: Eyes Over Us is a surreal procedurally generated narrative strategy game were you will play as a Lovecraftian entity watching over two humans being experimented with. The power to change everything it's on your hands..wait? do you even have hands?...tentacles?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This will run on your grandma's gamer PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.5Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you clean the crust of your PC it will run better.
